title: I Kardia tou Ktinous (The Heart of the Beast) Divx 704 x 528 Dol
description:
Studying philosophy at university has made Stefanos treat everyone else as his inferior. When he finishes his military service he thinks he owns the world. In reality, all he owns are the debts amassed by his mother who has just passed away and the rejection of his previously devoted girlfriend. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Divx file, can be used on a PS3, the movie came from the DvD which was presented at the 46th Thessaloniki International Film Festival in 2005 hence the timers on the top and bottom of the screen. 

Spoken language is Greek with English subtitles.
